comments: (Sofia: Hi, this is Sofia of the Clue Crew.  Today, you get Jeopardy! and the world-famous San Diego Zoo.  That's a lot of entertainment.)

The common type of this marsupial has coarse, thick fur while that of the hairy-nosed is short & silky
